sentence.Network_en: He thinks we are living in a fully integrated, supportive society.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为我们生活在一个完全和谐、相互扶持的社会里。

sentence.Network_en: She had a strong and supportive sister who urged her on.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一个坚强而支持她的姐姐在鼓励她。

sentence.Network_en: I am flattered that they should be so supportive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们这么帮忙，我深感荣幸。

entry.tran: 给予帮助的;热心援助的;支持的
entry.def: If you are supportive, you are kind and helpful to someone at a difficult or unhappy time in their life.

example.ex: They were always supportive of each other...
Her boss was very supportive and gave her time off work to see her mum.
example.tran: 她的老板非常热心地帮助她，并准许她请假去看望母亲。

sentences.sentence: "his family was supportive of his attempts to be a writer"

Sentence.sentence: People in supportive relationships may handle stress better.
Then there are the psychological benefits of a supportive partner
Most of the elderly people he interviewed said they had supportive and friendly dealings and got along well or very well with their sisters and brothers.

means.word_mean: 支持的,拥护的;赞助的;给予帮助的；支持的；鼓励的；同情的

sentences.en: We are totally supportive of this idea.
sentences.cn: 我们完全支持这个想法。

sentences.en: They were all extremely supportive to me.
Most of the staff who responded to the questionnaire were supportive.
sentences.cn: 回答了问卷的职员大多数表示支持。
